Rory David Arthur Penn1

M, #15602, b. 1980

Last Edited=18 Jul 2019

Rory David Arthur Penn was born in 1980.1 He is the son of Christopher Arthur Penn and Sabrina Mary Colman.1 He married Francesca Rosemary Boys, daughter of Andrew Boys and Deborah R. Walford, in 2008.2

Children of Rory David Arthur Penn and Francesca Rosemary Boys

Richard Henry Ramsbotham1

M, #15604

Last Edited=5 Jan 2021

Richard Henry Ramsbotham is the son of General David John Ramsbotham, Baron Ramsbotham and Susan Caroline Dickinson.1 He married Emma Elizabeth Colman, daughter of Sir Timothy James Alan Colman and Lady Mary Cecilia Bowes-Lyon, in 1986.1 He and Emma Elizabeth Colman were divorced in 1994.1

David Victor Bowes-Lyon1

M, #15606, b. 19 October 1973

Last Edited=27 May 2018

David Victor Bowes-Lyon was born on 19 October 1973.1 He is the son of Sir Simon Alexander Bowes-Lyon and Caroline Mary Victoria Pike.1 He married Jennifer Hurst, daughter of David Hurst, on 4 May 2002.1

He was educated at Eton College, Windsor, Berkshire, England.1 He was educated at Brasenose College, Oxford University, Oxford, Oxfordshire, England.1 He was educated at Yale University, New Haven, Connecticut, U.S.A.1

Elizabeth Harriet Colville1

F, #15608, b. 3 December 1952

Last Edited=2 Nov 2018

Consanguinity Index=0.04%

Elizabeth Harriet Colville was born on 3 December 1952.1 She is the daughter of Sir John Rupert Colville and Lady Margaret Egerton.2 She married David James Bowes-Lyon, son of Maj.-Gen. Sir Francis James Cecil Bowes-Lyon and Mary de Trafford, on 17 November 1976.1

Elizabeth Harriet Colville usually went by her middle name of Harriet.1 From 17 November 1976, her married name became Bowes-Lyon. She was appointed Companion, Order of the Bath (C.B.)3 She was appointed Commander, Royal Victorian Order (C.V.O.)3 She held the office of Lady-in-Waiting to HRH The Princess Royal in 1990.1,2

Citations

[S37] BP2003 volume 1, page 867. See link for full details for this source. Hereinafter cited as. [S37]

Rev. Sir George William Craufurd of Kilbirnie, 3rd Bt.1

M, #15609, b. 10 April 1797, d. 24 February 1881

Last Edited=19 Feb 2011

Rev. Sir George William Craufurd of Kilbirnie, 3rd Bt. was born on 10 April 1797.1 He was the son of Sir James Gregan-Craufurd of Kilbirnie, 2nd Bt. and Maria Theresa Gage.2 He married, firstly, Hon. Hester King, daughter of Peter King, 7th Lord King, Baron of Ockham and Lady Hester Fortescue, on 15 February 1843.1 He married, secondly, Martha Holland, daughter of John Holland, on 3 May 1849.1 He died on 24 February 1881 at age 83.1

He graduated from King's College, Cambridge University, Cambridge, Cambridgeshire, England , with a Master of Arts (M.A.)1 He succeeded as the 3rd Baronet Craufurd, of Kilbirney, Ayrshire [G.B., 1781] on 9 July 1839.1

Children of Rev. Sir George William Craufurd of Kilbirnie, 3rd Bt. and Hon. Hester King

Sir Charles William Frederick Craufurd, 4th Bt.+2 b. 28 Mar 1847, d. 24 Sep 1939

Henry Thomas Gage Craufurd2 b. 26 Feb 1848, d. c Jul 1848
